description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

title.en: Manga Time Kirara SUN(Manga Time Kirara Exhibition Final Limited Edition)

altTitles.ja: まんがタイムきらら展FINAL企画本 SUN

description.en: The handsome and affectionate pilot Zhou Jingze x the gentle and firm doctor Xu Sui. Summer is always hot, and so is the boy I love. Watch "Infatuated Prodigal Son" Zhou Jingze perform this role.
description.zh: 痞帅深情飞行员周京泽x温软坚定医生许随。夏天永远热烈，我爱的少年也是。看“痴情浪子”周京泽演绎这一份情有独钟。

altTitles.ja: 登校班

title.en: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure, Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure, Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyō na Bōken: Diamond wa Kudakenai
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Diamond wa Kudakenai

altTitles.es-la: La extraña aventura de JoJo Parte 4: El diamante es inquebrantable

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ダイヤモンドは砕けない

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 4 - Diamond is Unbreakable (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第4部 ダイヤモンドは砕けない カラー版

description.en: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting, the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!

altTitles.ja: ノトラレ
ノットネトラレ

description.en:
He may look shady, but no, it's not NTR!!!
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [Playboy-kun & Neat-chan](https://mangadex.org/title/62642f72-ed18-46f9-a8dd-4add20b752fc), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.en: Possibly the Greatest Alchemist of All Time

altTitles.ja: いずれ最強の錬金術師?

altTitles.en: Someday Will I Be the Greatest Alchemist?

description.en:
Not even a hero, Takumi Iruma gets accidentally mixed in with a group of heroes chosen to be summoned to another world. As compensation for the mix-up, a goddess offers him the right to choose any skill he wishes for! Hoping for a peaceful and quiet life that has nothing to do with fighting or going into battle, he chooses a seemingly boring creation skill. However, it turns out "alchemy" is the most powerful skill that allows him to create everything from a holy sword to flying ships! This cheat skill he unexpectedly acquired turns him into a wealthy merchant and makes him undefeatable in battles! A heartwarming adventure story about (possibly) the most powerful alchemist in another world!

*Alpha Manga*

---

*Alternate description:*

Iruma Takumi, a 40-year old salary man, was dragged into a hero summoning just like in a template. What was his fate? The Goddess sent him and the heroes to the other world separately.  
  
With the Goddess’ overprotective support, he landed in a different world looking handsome, rejuvenated, and quite different from a Japanese.  
  
Although he wanted a slow life while working in the manufacturing trade, that was not permitted by the Goddess’ special body and abilities.  
  
Would Takumi be able to live a peaceful life in a different world?

title.en: That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch

altTitles.zh: 关于被班上绿茶威胁那件事

altTitles.zh-ro: Guānyú bèi bān shàng lǜchá wēixié nà jiàn shì

altTitles.zh-hk: 關於被班上綠茶威脅那件事

altTitles.fr: La fois où la garce manipulatrice [garce au thé vert] de ma classe m'a fait chanter

description.en:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but in fact is manipulative and calculating.

After school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought you wide-eyed goody-two-shoes would do something like this."
"If you don't want me to expose your shameful secret…"

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!

title.en: Fushi no Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village

altTitles.ja-ro: Fushi no Kami ~Henkyou kara Hajimeru Bunmei Saiseiki~

altTitles.ja: フシノカミ～辺境から始める文明再生記～

description.en: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he can’t bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the church’s resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chief’s daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village. This is only the beginning of the story about a young boy who sets out to revolutionize the world in order to rebuild civilization and create his ideal life!
description.ja:
――意志を繋いだのは、いつだって本だった。

辺境の農村で暮らす少年アッシュには秘密があった。それは今より遙かに豊かな前世らしき記憶を持っている事。あまりに貧しく、辛い生活の中で、決意する――記憶にある便利な生活を、今世に取り戻そう、と。その鍵こそが、古代文明の叡智が記されたという〝書物〟の解読だった――。

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.th: นักเรียนพี่เลี้ยงเด็ก

altTitles.ja: 学園ベビーシッターズ

description.en: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.
description.pt: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.
description.pt-br: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.

title.en: You've Got the Wrong House, Villain

altTitles.en: You Have Got the Wrong House, Villain
You've Come to the Wrong House, Villain

altTitles.fr: Tu es arrivé à la maison fautive, méchant

altTitles.ar: لقد حصلت على المنزل الخطأ أيها الشرير

altTitles.es-la: Villano, estás en la casa equivocada

description.en:
As if it weren't enough for me to be reincarnated as a child in the slums, I was taken to a city of crime and became a test subject. But then, when I saw the man that came to destroy the research institute, I realized that this place was the world of *Piper*, a reverse harem novel. While living a relatively normal life after escaping from the institute, the heroine of the novel moved in next door. From the looks of it, I might be the heroine's neighbor, an extra. Originally, the heroine was to save the unconscious and fatally wounded villain and in return, be subject to a fanatical obsession. But, why. Why is the sub-villain collapsed in front of my house? The sub-villain, Lakis Avalon, was the king of the underworld and the very same frightening man that I had met at the institute before. I took a moment’'s glance around then I kicked the man’s body away.

Hey, you're got the wrong house, villain.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: 君は放課後インソムニア

altTitles.pt-br: Insones - Caçando estrelas depois da aula

altTitles.vi: Câu lạc bộ những kẻ mất ngủ

description.en:
Nakami is a studious but cranky and antisocial high schooler who gets on his classmates' nerves. However, his bad attitude comes from the fact that he has a sleeping disorder, and frequently spends nights on end without a single minute of sleep. During the preparations for the school festival, he is begrudgingly sent to the school's astronomy observatory to gather cardboard boxes, a place which is said to be haunted by the dire happenings of the now defunct Astronomy Club. He finds the isolated place a haven ripe for him to sleep, but while rummaging around, he stumbles upon his classmate Magari Isaki sleeping inside a toppled-over locker.   
  
Isaki, unlike him, is a personable and popular girl at class, but who also hides her own problems with insomnia. Looking for a middle ground, they find that there's comfort and ease in sleeping together, so they resort to make the observatory their own private cubby to sleep… Have they found the comfort they're looking for?
description.es:
Nakami es un muchacho de secundaria estudioso pero irritable y antisocial que irrita a sus compañeros de clase. Sin embargo, su mala actitud se debe al hecho de que tiene un desorden del sueño, y pasa noches enteras sin dormir un minuto. En el momento de las preparaciones del festival escolar, sus compañeros lo mandan a regañadientes al observatorio de astronomía para traer cajas de cartón, y dicho lugar se rumora está maldecido por los hechos macabros del otrora Club de Astronomía. Una vez allí, encuentra que el sitio es un lugar ideal para dormir, pero mientras esculca, se tropieza con su compañera Magari Isaki, que duerme en un casillero tumbado.  
  
Isaki, al contrario de él, es una muchacha popular y amistosa, pero que también oculta sus propios problemas con la insomnia. Negociando sobre qué hacer, se dan cuenta que hay comodidad y facilidad en dormir juntos, así que resuelven hacer del observatorio su propio rincón privado para dormir… ¿Han así encontrado la comodidad que tanto buscan?
description.fr:
Ganta Nakami est insomniaque. À l'école, il semble donc fatigué, voire associable. Un jour, dans la salle d'astronomie, il découvre Isaki Magari, endormie dans un coin. Insomniaque comme lui, mais bien plus sociable, elle lui propose de partager l'endroit pour y dormir en cachette. Leur rapprochement semble les aider à retrouver le sommeil, chacun étant sensible aux battements de cœur de l'autre…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Soleil Manga**
description.pt-br: Nakami é um estudante dedicado, porém, sempre parece estar irritado, o que faz seus colegas de classe não gostarem dele. Porém essa atitude é devido ao fato dele ter insônia, passando a maior parte da noite em claro, sem conseguir dormir nem um minuto sequer. Durante a preparação do festival escolar, ele foi enviado contra a sua vontade para pegar cartolina na sala do observatório de astronomia da escola, um lugar que tem fama de ser mal-assombrado. Lá ele encontra um lugar calma e isolado para dormir, mas enquanto ele verificava o local ele encontra sua colega de classe Magari Isaki, que estava dormindo lá. Após ambos descobrirem sobre o problema de insônia um do outro, eles decidem dividir aquele local como refúgio para poderem dormir. Por quanto tempo será que eles poderão se aproveitar desse conforto? E será que a sala do observatório realmente é mal-assombrada?

description.en: It starts with a mountain. A strategic leader gets isekai-ed into a war dynasty. He only has a group of members who were planning to ditch him. Facing this war era, he thinks of stealing food and girls to live a king’s life. He is hot-blooded, picks fights with war heroes. How will he bring chaos to the war? Will he be able to rise up high?

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

---

description.id:
Kolaborasi yang luar biasa dari author "Noblesse" dan author "Girls the Wild's"! Kisah aksi fantasi mengenai Kaiden yang jiwanya masuk ke seekor kucing gendut dan Jiwoo yang suka menyembunyikan kekuatannya!

description.ja:
敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

description.ko:
<노블레스> 손제호 작가와 <소녀더와일즈> 제나 작가가 만났다!
고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우
러블리 2인조의 액션 판타지

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)

description.th:
เรื่องใหม่ของนักเขียน Son Je-ho จาก <โนเบลส> และ Zhena จาก <วีน เหวี่ยง WILD มัธยมสาวพันธุ์ดุ>! แอ็กชันแฟนตาซีสุดน่ารัก เรื่องราวของ "ไคเดน" ผู้มีพลังพิเศษแต่แฝงตัวด้วยการสิงอยู่ในร่างแมว และ "จีอู" นักเรียนหนุ่มทาสแมวแสนธรรมดาที่แอบซ่อนพลังที่ไม่ธรรมดาเอาไว้

没想到铲屎官也有超能力!

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム ヴァルプルギスEVE

description.en:
Haman Khan's sister stands up for her country!
In January 0089 of the Universal Century, Neo Zeon is defeated by AEUG in the final battle. Defeated by the ZZ Gundam, Haman Karn is killed in battle, and the remaining Neo Zeon warriors decide to fight in mourning. In order to counter the one-sided attack, Serana Khan, Haman Khan's sister, makes a sortie with the NT exclusive MS prototype Demartell. The secret story of the birth of the fake Haman Karn from "Mobile Suit Gundam Valpurgis" and the story of the birth of Over.On, which has never been told before, will be depicted!
description.ja:
ハマーン・カーンの妹、祖国のために立ち上がる――！

宇宙世紀００８９年１月、ネオ・ジオンはエゥーゴに最終決戦で敗北する。ZZガンダムに敗北したハマーン・カーンは戦死し、残されたネオ・ジオンの戦士たちは弔い合戦の決意をする。一方的な攻撃に対抗するためハマーン・カーンの妹、セラーナ・カーンはNT専用MSプロトタイプ・ディマーテルで出撃するのであった。今まで語られることのなかった「機動戦士ガンダム ヴァルプルギス」の偽ハマーン・カーン誕生秘話とオーヴェロン誕生の物語が描かれる――！

altTitles.th: ไม่เป็นนางฟ้าได้ไหมเนี่ย

altTitles.ja: ガヴリールドロップアウト

description.en: A fallen angel with falling grades! Gabriel White Tenma has descended from heaven to attend high school and guide humanity, but a newly found video game addiction might say otherwise.
description.ru: Габриэль-Тенма Уайт была одной из самых прилежных учениц Академии Ангелов. Но вот пришло время выпуска, и Габриэль отправилась на Землю дабы выполнить порученную ей миссию: показать людям правильный путь и подарить им счастье. Однако, действительно ли всё будет именно так? Не изменит ли ангела новое место, куда она попала?..
description.pt-br:
A comédia desenrola-se em torno de Gabriel White, que se formou no topo da classe na escola de anjos e que frequenta uma escola humana na terra em busca de conhecimento, mas, um jogo web atrai toda a sua atenção e acaba decidindo que dá muito trabalho ir para outros lugares.  
  

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 5, Cap 39.] ( Porém pulou os capítulos 29 e 38, além disso o episódio 12 é original. )

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Watashi ni Dake Tenparu Joushi no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 私にだけテンパる上司の話

altTitles.en: The Story about My Boss Who Only Gets Flustered with Me

description.en: My boss, Hiyakawa-san, is always scowling and intimidates people at work. But for some reason, he makes mistakes, blurts out the things on his mind, and shows his careless side only in front of me...? Blushing, suspicions, and awkward, runaway conversations galore! A cute romcom between an easily flustered boss and his dorky subordinate begins!

title.en: It Turns Out That I Have a Fiancee, but She Is the Famous “Villainess” of the School. What Should I Do?

altTitles.ja: 許嫁が出来たと思ったら、その許嫁が学校で有名な『悪役令嬢』だったんだけど、どうすればいい？

altTitles.ja-ro: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" datta n dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

description.en:
"I have a fiancée...?"

One day, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, an ordinary high school student, is told a surprising fact by his father about an arranged engagement.

His fiancée is Kiryu Ayane, the "Villainess" at school, known to everyone for her sharp tongue and coldhearted personality. 

A heartwarming love story of two high school students that melts the icy heart of a "Villainess" begins!
description.ja:
許嫁がいる……ある日、父から驚きの事実を聞かされた普通の高校生・東九条浩之。
その許嫁とは、学園の誰もが知る、クールでドライな“悪役令嬢”・桐生彩音だった!?

悪役令嬢の氷の心を溶かす、高校生たちの胸あつく少しせつない恋愛ストーリー――！

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Ossan Healer and the Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-Aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

description.en: A small village finds itself at the mercy of mysterious entities that hover over the city, at least that's what young Anna often sees. On the other side of the city, Margot, a middle-aged woman, also sees the anomalies. What will be the connection between the two? Are the things they see nothing more than delusions, or do other people just not want to see them? Plot and script: Yoshino Yuki (@yoshino_yuki4) Translation : Freya Ariello (@freya.dangel) Editor : Lan Saza (@lansaza) Book publisher: Equafro Studios (@equafrostudios)
description.pt-br: Um pequeno vilarejo se encontra à mercê de misteriosas entidades que pairam a cidade, pelo menos é o que a jovem Anna costuma ver com frequência. Do outro lado da cidade, Margot, uma mulher de meia idade, também enxerga as anomalias. Qual será a ligação entre ambas? Será que as coisas que vêem não passam de delírios, ou será que as demais pessoas é que não querem vê-las?

altTitles.ja: 峠鬼

altTitles.en: Touge Oni: Primal Gods in Ancient Times

description.en: In ancient times, there existed the land of Wa, split between the reign of the gods and the world of man. It was an age when gods and men existed together. Miyo, an orphan girl, spent her days trying to accept her upcoming death as the designated sacrifice for the god worshipped by her village, Kippuuson-no-Mikoto-no-Kami. However, her fate changed as she encountered En-no-Ozuno, a monk with supernatural abilities capable of conversing with the gods. An orphan girl, a great monk, and a demon boy. Follow their adventure as they encounter the gods, traveling through even dimension and time.
description.pt-br:
Nos tempos antigos, existia a terra de Wa, dividida entre o reino dos deuses e o mundo dos homens. Era uma época em que deuses e homens viviam juntos.


Miyo, uma garota órfã, passava seus dias tentando aceitar sua morte iminente como o sacrifício designado para o deus adorado por sua aldeia, Kippuuson-no-Mikoto-no-Kami. No entanto, seu destino mudou quando ela encontrou En-no-Ozuno, um monge com habilidades sobrenaturais capaz de conversar com os deuses. 

Uma garota órfã, um grande monge e um garoto demônio. Acompanhe a aventura deles enquanto encontram deuses, viajando por diferentes realidades e eras.

description.en: Ji-hwan Kang, who was forced to transfer schools after getting involved in a gang fight, decides to ask Yu-seong Han, the top student in the class, for help with his studies. However, he accidentally tears Yu-seong's school uniform. But what's that on Yu-seong's back? A tiger tattoo on this supposedly model student?! Ji-hwan proposes to keep Yu-seong's tattoo and identity a secret in exchange for tutoring. In response, Yu-seong deliberately begins to engage in close physical contact, hoping to make Ji-hwan give up on his own...

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我牧师，都什么阴间技能

altTitles.vi: Tiān Shēng Dú Nǎi, Wǒ Zǔzhòule Quán Shìjiè!

description.en:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

altTitles.ja: パパのセクシードール

description.en: Born into a wealthy family, she lost her mother at a young age. She is Riona, a girl who was raised by a single father. At the girls' school she attends, she has many friends and a special partner of hers. She lives feeling a little lonely that her busy father has just left her house.One day, her father bought a robot that she said was her "housemaid". She witnessed the act of "Forty"...?A girl who wants her affection and a robot who doesn't know her feelings. A dramatic story of gems!

title.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of the Demon King

altTitles.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of Demon King

description.en: A female assassin from the modern era transmigrates into a cheesy Western-themed fantasy otome game and needs to make the Demonic male leads fall in love with her in order to save the world. Bent on returning to reality, she begins to train the assassination skills of the evil second female lead, Lisa, in the hope that Lisa will kill her, but because of her stubbornly silly personality and various types of ambiguous physical contact, she made Lisa fall in love with her?

altTitles.en: First of All, Let's Hide My Younger Brother
First Let's Hide My Younger Brother
Let's Hide My Younger Brother First

altTitles.ja: 弟は今留守番中です

description.en:
I've possessed a character in an R-rated BL manhwa. It's in a world where people, whose craziness ranges from one to ten, appear.

"Franz, can you take off your clothes for a moment?"

"Sister? Wh-why my clothes?"

Their crazy serenade had already begun. Having been faced with the violence my younger brother had to endure, I made a vow.

"Instead of Franz, I'll have *Schuette* instead."

Those people are coming soon. The people who will exterminate my family, and when that's not enough, they'll devour my younger brother's innocence.

"And I'll become a knight to succeed our family and carry on its legacy."

If he doesn't go, I'll die! That's how I thoroughly hid my brother and decided attend all the official events myself. …But something's wrong.

"I do! I love Kyla Vesta!"

"If Young Miss gets hurt, then I'll…"

"I don't feel the need to wait any longer."

Didn't you all like men? Why are you all suddenly obsessed with me?

---
The fate of a girl in a BL novel is a tragic one. Girls are either vaguely helpful, evil, or add nothing to the plot. So what happens when you turn into the older sister of a BL novel protagonist? The older sister who dies a tragic death at the hands of a madman who’s infatuated with your younger brother? You go with your gut instinct: hide him. Hide your brother from everything, especially men, that could harm him and you. That’s the task that Kyla Vesta is set with in this life, and a task that she’s determined to complete.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EC%84%A0-%EB%82%A8%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D%EB%B6%80%ED%84%B0-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%90/2649), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57492806)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74283)
description.zh:
穿越到自己读过的纯爱小说里，成为了主角的姐姐！偏执狂男主的第一牺牲者竟然是我… 为了活命首先把弟弟藏起来，代替他成为骑士，可是为什么男主不按常理出牌突然开始纠缠我？！

---

altTitles.ja: ストーカー×ストーカー

description.en: Getta and Taiyo, college students who were close friends. One day, Taiyo finds out that he was stalking Getta. However, Getta is a stalker of the sun, and collects the baby teeth of the sun.

altTitles.ja: 両片思いオーバーキル！

description.en:
"I never thought I would fall in love..."
"But I'm not sure how I feel about this person, much less this other person!"
You can't have it both ways! This is a love comedy with too much tension!

altTitles.ja: 先輩、美味しいですか？

description.en:
Miho is a university student who bears trauma relating to food. Suddenly, she finds herself with a pretend partner. Not only that, her pretend partner is the #1 most beautiful woman in the university, Mori-senpai!? A girl's socializing story presented through food by the author of *Fuzuroi no Renri*!

official voice comic promotion: https://youtu.be/3TPxS6u2Ztk (Raw)

title.en: WORST Gaiden Saburoku Santa Namonaki Karasu-tachi

altTitles.ja: WORST外伝 サブロクサンタ 名もなきカラスたち

altTitles.en: WORST Side Story Saburoku Santa - Crows Without a Name

altTitles.vi: Ngoại truyện WORST Bata khu 36 - Những con quạ không tên

altTitles.ja-ro: Worst Gaiden Saburoku Santa - Na mo Naki Karasu-tachi

description.en: This manga depicts the one-year gap in the story when Harumichi Bouya leaves Suzuran Boys High School until Hana Tsukishima arrives at Toaru City.
description.ja:
不良漫画の金字塔『クローズ』『WORST』最新スピンオフ!!

坊屋春道が街から去り、月島花はまだ「圏外」にいる、そんな時期の戸亜留市で、不良の歴史に刻まれなかった熱き男たちがいた。
名もなきカラスたちの疾走する青春群像劇!!

altTitles.ja: 人形のひとり立ち

description.en: A story about a doll that stands and walks on her own.
description.ja: 立って歩く人形のおはなしです

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: 陰キャギャルでもイキがりたい！

altTitles.en: Even the Introverted Gals Wanna Get Out There!

description.en: Ichiko and Kuran are members of the subculture research club. They like various subcultures and they like cute stuff. Read along as these two asocial gyaru spend their days in their new kind of "youthful moratorium."

title.en: Quick Transmigration: The Villain is Too Spoiled and Flirty

altTitles.zh-ro: Kuài Chuān: Fǎn Pài Tài Chǒng Tài Liāo Rén

altTitles.en: Quick to Wear: The Villain Is Too Spoiled and Too Provocative

description.en:
In order to be resurrected, Sheng Nuan needs to transmigrate into different worlds as a minor supporting female character and complete tasks to prevent the villains from turning evil. However... aren't these villains supposed to be cold-blooded and obsessive? Why are they all starting to say things like, 

"Nuan Nuan, you can't go anywhere except stay by my side..."

"Nuan Nuan, for you, I would destroy kingdoms without hesitation!"

"Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon."

Sheng Nuan: ???

title.en: Kanaria wa Kiraboshi no Yume wo Miru

altTitles.ja: カナリアは綺羅星の夢をみる

description.en:
Ayano is a schoolgirl who dreams of pursuing a career fashion. On the day of her first ball, she encounters a beautiful girl.

Charmed by the foreign-looking girl called Tsubaki-hime, Ayano's dreams grow stronger. But Ayano's mother, looking down on her hobbies, plots to get in her way. Meanwhile, Tsubaki-hime seems to have some  kind of circumstances of her own...

This is a Taishō-era romance about girls closing in on their dreams.

(source: Yuri Hime, translated)
description.ja:
服飾の道へ進むことを夢見る女学生の文乃は、初めて舞踏会に参加した日に、美しい少女と出会った。椿姫と呼ばれる日本人離れした容姿の少女に惹かれて夢を膨らませる文乃だが、文乃の趣味をよく思っていない母が道を阻もうと画策する一方で、椿姫にも何やら事情があるようで…。

夢を巡る少女たちの大正浪漫物語。

altTitles.ja: レジスター

description.en: How young is too young to fall in love? How old is too old to fall in love? Who decides the end of the flowery days of youth and the beginning of the same? In the eastern part of Tokyo, at a supermarket in a town zero meters above sea level. A chance encounter for two people over the cashier's counter. A youth-returning story where something might start!
description.ja:
いくつまで恋が出来るのか。
いくつから恋が出来るのか。
青春の終わりを、始まりを、誰が決めるのか。
東京東部、
海抜ゼロメートルの町のスーパーマーケット。
レジカウンター越しの二人。
何かが始まるかもしれない青春リターナブル・ストーリー！

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

title.en: Mobile Suits Gundam: Red Giant 03rd MS Team

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム 赤い三巨星

description.en:
A “red” comet, a black “three” binary star, and a blue “giant star” -- we are the “red three giant stars”!
Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After finishing the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon army "Wandering Group" was retreating. Somehow, they made it to space where their friends were... Meanwhile, a unit of the Federation Forces, the Red Three Giants, appeared!

Tang San was a talented apprentice to the great Tang Sect. Due to mastering the forbidden Tang arts, he was pressured to jump off a cliff and died. However, he was reborn into another world filled with Essence Spirits. At the age of six, every person will have their essence spirit awoken. Spirits can take many forms: weapons, plants, and animals; They can help people with their daily lives. Outstanding spirits can be trained to engage in combat. A spirit master is the soul and heart of the Combat Continent! When Tang San turns six, a huge surprise awaits him. His peaceful life in this new world will change completely.

For a very long time, the Baek family has been haunted by the legendary existence known as "Illishine." Hong Soorim, who has been imprisoned for ten years due to suspicions about this existence, finally shows a mark on his body upon turning twenty. The company that has been keeping her decides to strike a deal with both Chairman Baek and his son, Baek Wookyung. Wookyung offers a higher price than his father to meet Soorim. As Soorim accepts his fate, he tries to use Wookyung to his advantage. Despite their age difference, Wookyung finds himself drawn to Soorim...

At 19, Kim Gunho is transported to the 23rd century with enhanced abilities. After spending 50 painful years preventing an apocalypse, he returns to his younger self at 19. Now, with the threat gone and no one aware of his suffering, all he desires is to rest and even wishes to die. It will take 100 days to fully eliminate his enhanced cells. As he prepares to spend his final days in peace, he is unexpectedly visited by Ye Haejung, the boy he secretly loved before his time travel.

title.en: The Vampire Dies in No Time

altTitles.en: The Vampire Dies In No Time.

altTitles.ja: 吸血鬼すぐ死ぬ

description.en:
Vampires are said to have many weaknesses to balance out their incredible powers. The vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to... everything. He dies, disintegrating into a pile of sand, at the slightest shock.

After a disastrous encounter with the vampire hunter (and author) Ronaldo leaves Draluc’s castle destroyed, Draluc decides to pack up his remaining belongings and adorable armadillo familiar John and move into Ronaldo’s office (despite the hunter’s protests). Chaos ensues as this unlikely duo is forced to work together while fending off perverted vampires, Ronaldo's terrifying editor, Draluc’s eccentric family, and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way.
  
[Anime Adaptation Announcement](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-06/itaru-bonnoki-the-vampire-dies-in-no-time-manga-gets-anime/.159208)

title.en: Bouken ni wa, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~

altTitles.ja: 冒険には、武器が必要だ！～こだわりルディの鍛冶屋ぐらし～

altTitles.ja-ro: Bouken ni ha, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~

altTitles.en: Every Adventure Needs Weapons!: The Meticulous Rudy's Blacksmith Life
Weapons Are Necessary For Adventures!: The Fixated Rudy's Blacksmith Life

description.en: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"
description.ja: 迷宮前町の金物屋で働く見習いの少女・ルディは親方に怒られながらも奇想天外な武器を作って、世界一の鍛冶職人を目指して奮闘中。 迷宮の外側の街で冒険を支える普通の人々の日常を描くクラフト・ファンタジー！
description.pt-br: Uma jovem chamada Rudy pode sonhar em se tornar a melhor armeira do mundo, mas, no momento, ela é apenas uma aprendiz em uma loja de ferramentas. Ela não consegue evitar levar broncas de seu mestre por criar as armas mais malucas! Nesta cidade-dungeon onde heróis se aventuram, vivencie o dia a dia das pessoas comuns que mantêm tudo funcionando perfeitamente! Bem-vindo ao seu "Craft Fantasy!"

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

description.en:
Chris, a detective specializing in serious crimes, has been pursuing the culprit of a murder case for five years. During his investigation, he is unexpectedly saved by Anton.
"Who are you, really?"
"If you're curious, spend the night with me."
Everything about their relationship is suspicious, yet Chris finds himself irresistibly drawn to Anton.
